titleInfo.title: Letter from John Jacob, Jacobabad, to Lewis Pelly

physicalDescription.extent: The contents of the letter have been written vertically from folios 172 to 175 and then the paper has been turned horizontally and the letter concludes on folio 174.

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the downfall of the Native Indian Army and Jacob's concerns over the promotion of officers and regiments and corps.The letter also discusses Pelly's health, questions of religion, and Jacob's views on the church (Church of England).
